com.yworks.yfiles.view.input

Class RectangleReshapeHandleProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.AbstractReshapeHandleProvider
      • com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.RectangleReshapeHandleProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IReshapeHandleProvider

    public class RectangleReshapeHandleProvider
extends AbstractReshapeHandleProvider
    A simple convenience implementation of an IReshapeHandleProvider that returns handles that modify a IMutableRectangle.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RectangleReshapeHandleProvider(IMutableRectangle rectangle)
      Creates a default instance that provide handles for each of the positions given for the rectangle.
      RectangleReshapeHandleProvider(IMutableRectangle rectangle, HandlePositions handlePositions)
      Creates a default instance that provide handles for each of the positions given for the rectangle.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IHandle getHandle(IInputModeContext context, HandlePositions position)
      Provides a IHandle that uses the rectangle instance to perform the actual reshaping.
      protected IMutableRectangle getRectangle()
      The rectangle to read the current state from.

      • Methods inherited from class com.yworks.yfiles.view.input.AbstractReshapeHandleProvider

        getAvailableHandles, getHandlePositions, getMaximumSize, getMinimumEnclosedArea, getMinimumSize, setHandlePositions, setMaximumSize, setMinimumEnclosedArea, setMinimumSize

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • RectangleReshapeHandleProvider

        public RectangleReshapeHandleProvider(IMutableRectangle rectangle)
        Creates a default instance that provide handles for each of the positions given for the rectangle.
        Parameters:
        rectangle - The rectangle to create handles for.

      • RectangleReshapeHandleProvider

        public RectangleReshapeHandleProvider(IMutableRectangle rectangle,
                                      HandlePositions handlePositions)
        Creates a default instance that provide handles for each of the positions given for the rectangle.
        Parameters:
        rectangle - The rectangle to create handles for.
        handlePositions - A bitwise combination of all handle positions this instance should provide a handle for.

    • Method Detail

      • getHandle

        public IHandle getHandle(IInputModeContext context,
                         HandlePositions position)
        Provides a IHandle that uses the rectangle instance to perform the actual reshaping.

        This method may be called for each possible single position contained in the set as returned by IReshapeHandleProvider.getAvailableHandles(IInputModeContext).

        Specified by:
        getHandle in interface IReshapeHandleProvider
        Specified by:
        getHandle in class AbstractReshapeHandleProvider
        Parameters:
        context - The context for which the handles are queried.
        position - The position to provide an instance for.
        Returns:
        A handle implementation.

      • getRectangle

        protected final IMutableRectangle getRectangle()
        The rectangle to read the current state from.
        Returns:
        The Rectangle.
